title: Add utility function make_tensor
body_html:
Summary: Current implementation of Tensor takes an intrusive_ptr as an argument for storing data. But instead of requiring users to explicitly pass an intrusive_ptr we want them to pass args for intrusive ptr directly which are forwarded internally through new helper function called make_tensor

Differential Revision: D10152661

body:
